name: Heritage Game Jam 2020 - Cultural Assembly
description:
Play as a Samsui woman/heritage building hybrid that shoots bricks to assemble buildings... like the Istana! Enjoy this paroage (parody and homage) to celebrate Singapore's heritage for the soon-to-come National Day holiday, as you:

  • Thwart the annoying mynah birbs from poking at your stuff
  • and save the rickshaw riders
  • to help you on the way to CULTURAL ASSEMBLY!

Controls
Directional keys: Movement
S key: Fire brick to assemble building / thwart off intruders
